items.content_html: Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.
